DOC.brief_summary: The investigators hypothesize that omega does-dependently improves vascular and insulin resistance.
DOC.brief_title: Vascular and Metabolic Effects of Omega-3 Fatty Acids
DOC.criteria: hypertriglyceridemia overt liver disease, chronic renal failure, hypothyroidism, myopathy, uncontrolled diabetes (HbA1c > 9%), severe hypertension, stroke, acute coronary events, coronary revascularization within the preceding 3 months, or alcohol abuse
